professional_summary: DBA with expertise in Oracle and Microsoft SQL Server, experienced in RAC, Data Guard, and cloud platforms like Oracle Cloud and Azure Cosmos DB. Proven leader with a focus on delivering high-quality database solutions within SLA.

key_responsibilities: Successfully converted standalone database to RAC.
Configured 3-node RAC database with standby DB.
Created ASM instance and disk groups.
